sections.In the books: In the ''[[A  Song of Ice and Fire|A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Hills of Norvos are part of an immense region of hills and mountains which dominates the north-western corner of Essos. This region extends for several hundred miles from just south of [[Braavos]], encompassing much of the territory east to [[Qohor]] and south along the [[Rhoyne]] and its tributaries. The Velvet Hills near [[Pentos]] are an off-shoot of this range. The term 'Hills of [[Andalos]]' has also been used to describe part of this region.
